channel.title: Clean508 [Version 0.5]
channel.description:
NOTE: Next version will actually be called "Clean508" in-game.
[b]Base: BerkyScape[/b]
Decided to clean BerkyScape out a bit, so here is basically what I cleaned:
[i]Starting Size: 3.88 MB 0.5 Size: 1.88 MB
Commands.java now 4KB, used to be 20+kb Actionbuttons.java now 22KB, used to be 30+kb
Player.java cleaned Frames.java cleaned CFG Lists are wiped Npcdrops cleaned
Lists have been deleted.[/i]
Don't need pics for this because it's a basic 508, but here's the link:
*
Credits: 90% Berky 10% Me
~Albert

item.title: Clean508 [Version 0.5]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Unic0der fuck off, it’s obvious that he got muted and we don’t need your spam.

@Mod - I reported the topic because he wants it deleted, and because he can’t do it himself.

item.title: Clean508 [Version 0.5]
item.dc:creator: @Unic0der Unic0der
item.description:
@Unic0der wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:15, topic:313828”][quote author=hussain123 link=topic=410324.msg3027788#msg3027788 date=1258147326]
There is currently no pictures showing about this source, please add couple of pictures to provent people from thinking this is an virus.
When pictures are totally added, convincing from the link, it’s totally broken, causing problems will accur in your message, please take notice.

Thank-you
Hussain123
[/quote]

Fuck you kid.

EDIT: Oh yeah I added a pic, can’t WBM me anymore can you? Link isn’t broken btw, L2click linkz
[center] I can type, yet I choose not to for people like you. No matter what I say, you are going to continue. So, to make my life easier, this is the only one I’ll say: this is your last chance. If you continue to spam and flame others, you will be permanently banned, no questions asked.

Thanks for playing.[/center][/quote]

LMAO!!! sucks u got muted

Read full topic

item.description:

Davidi2:

Ok. Well also fix the resets if you really want people to download a no-feature source.

item.title: Clean508 [Version 0.5]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Davidi2:

But why would people want a Berky without the features? Isn’t that just the Bulby base that he used?

Yeah. Making it stable, and then releasing, dunno why I really released this tbh, but it was Thursday night, I was bored, had to go to sleep soon so I decided to release what I have so far.

Right now I’m working on improving the process method, and stuff like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Clean508 [Version 0.5]
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:313828”]FYI: File size has nothing to do with stability.

Also: How do you know you ‘cleaned’ it? Isn’t cleaner a matter of perspective? What exactly did you do.

Not saying this is bad at all, just asking what you did to ‘clean’ it.[/quote]

I actually had 0.5 in the title, removed it. Might as well add it again.

Pretty much just removed all the features, now I’m working at actually making it stable.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 13, 2009, 02:17:18 pm[/size][hr][quote=“jmood128, post:5, topic:313828”]You should give credit to the creatator of the 508 source its self, because I don’t think Berky made a 508 base[/quote]

And yes, Berky made the base ofc, I gave 90% credits to him.

Read full topic
